full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 22 of 228 698 LC2VMAX2 Kane - Redirect 1 Q. On the first page there is the name of a counsellor or principal for the student's prior high school. Do you see that name? 2 3 4 A. Yes, I do. 5 Q. And while you don't need to read it out, do you have any reason to doubt that that was, in fact, the student's prior principal? 6 7 8 A. I have no reason to doubt. 9 Q. All right. Thank you. 10 REDIRECT EXAMINATION 11 BY MR. ROHRBACH: 12 Q. Mr. Kane, on cross-examination you were asked about payment records for the student in this application. Did you find any 13 14 payment records reflecting who paid for that student's education? 15 16 A. No. Financial records are kept separately from the student file. 17 18 Q. Thank you. No further questions. 19 MS. MENNINGER: No, thank you, your Honor. 20 THE COURT: All right. Thank you, Mr. Kane. 21 You may step down. You are excused. Thank you. 22 (Witness excused) 23 THE COURT: The government may call its next witness. 24 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, the government calls Dr. 25 Lisa Rocchio. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017895
